main.name: Lerato Celine Coetzee
main.description: Passionate smart working individual, looking to make a name for herself. I am very good and patient with people, I respect boundaries, opinions and I am constantly looking to better myself. I find joy in bringing out and celebrating different perspectives on different situations. I am open minded and lead by my principles and values. In everything I am involved in, my aim is to give it my maximum effort and be the best, and at the same time a fair team player. I firmly believe that beautiful moments only come once and a collection of those moments mixed with lessons build a quality life.
main.bio1: Currently, I am studying education at the University of Johannessburg, majoring in Afrikaans and History.
main.bio2: I concider myself to be a strong willed, highly ambitious learner, possessing strong and relevant skills to lead and at the same time deliver all that the client and the business needs and wants. I excel at understanding customers and communicating their needs to the business. I am big at growth and self-empowerment, as a result I am always educating and challenging myself. I uphold professionalisim and ubuntu above all things in the work environment.
main.bio3: I have a proven track record of always upskilling myself to the next level consistently aiming to do my absolute best in every task. My record also proves I have always been efficent in driving teams and individuals in meeting set organisational goals.
main.contactmessage: Leave me a message here if you want to get in contact with me.

resume.skillmessage: To utilise my skills and experience in enhancing stakeholder value.

work.title: Administrative officer and Business Analyst
description: Maintaining relations with costumers on behalf of the company.
Following up on document processing between the company and the clients
Setting up meetings between clients and the company.
Following up on task completions with the development team.
Negotiating quotations to clients and setting up payment plans if needed.
Translating business requirements to software developers.
Testing and ensuring quality for the end user.
